reg_pit.acttitle: Financial Administration Act; Liquor Control and Licensing Act
reg_pit.title: Retention of Fees for Attendance at Training Program Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 167/2015, effective August 14, 2015.

reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Financial Administration Act; Liquor Control and Licensing Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Retention of Fees for Attendance at Training Program Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 46/2014, March 31, 2014]

bcl:section.bcl:text: The go2 Tourism HR Society is authorized to retain, as remuneration for all services performed, the fees set and collected under the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation in respect of the "Serving It Right: The Responsible Beverage Service Program".
Unless earlier repealed, this regulation is repealed on September 30, 2015.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, section 14 and Liquor Control and Licensing Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 267, s. 84]

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 46/2014, effective March 31, 2014.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Unless earlier repealed, this regulation is repealed five years after the date on which it is deposited.
